questions.question: _____ used to generate electricity from wind
Energy we get from sun is ______
A gift of nature becomes resource when it satisfies human needs
Other name of petroleum is black gold
Hydro electricity is generated from water
(Write) Define fuel
answers: Material that burns to get energy

questions.question: (Write) Define resource
answers: Material that burns to get energy

questions.question: (Write) Two types of resources
answers: land, air, water, soil are NR*
things made by humans like building, roads are HMR*

questions.question: (Write) uses of coal
answers: Used to cook, heat and generate electricity

questions.question: (Write) How can we conserve natural resources
answers: should not pollute air, water, soil

questions.question: (Write) Difference In-exhaustible resource and Exhaustible
answers: Do not get exhausted after use

questions.question: (Write) New buildings have solar heaters and roof tops
(Write) Why plants are green gold
answers: plants are source of health and wealth
give food, oxygen and other useful things
